rb_notes.text:
EIGRP is an enhanced version of IGRP. The same distance vector technology found in IGRP is also used in EIGRP, and the underlying distance information remains unchanged.

This runbook only verifies basic running status and configurations relate to EIGRP.
1. Monitoring EIGRP running status.
2. Highlighting EIGRP Configurations and EIGRP AS number.
3. Retrieving CLI commands about EIGRP.

This runbook only verifies basic running status and configurations relate to EIGRP.
1. Monitoring EIGRP running status.
2. Highlighting EIGRP Configurations and EIGRP AS number.
3. Retrieving CLI commands about EIGRP.
